author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA RAPIDLY INTENSIFYING... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES EXPECTED IN PORTIONS OF JAMAICA AND SOUTHERN HISPANIOLA THROUGH MIDWEEK...
summary: ...MELISSA RAPIDLY INTENSIFYING... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES EXPECTED IN PORTIONS OF JAMAICA AND SOUTHERN HISPANIOLA THROUGH MIDWEEK... As of 2:00 AM EDT Sun Oct 26 the center of Melissa was located near 16.3, -76.1 with movement WSW at 5 mph. The minimum central pressure was 958 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 120 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MELISSA RAPIDLY INTENSIFYING... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES EXPECTED IN PORTIONS OF JAMAICA AND SOUTHERN HISPANIOLA THROUGH MIDWEEK... As of 2:00 AM EDT Sun Oct 26 the center of Melissa was located near 16.3, -76.1 with movement WSW at 5 mph. The minimum central pressure was 958 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 120 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
